timeline.bodyText: this may be even easier to read if you put the return statement on line 20 rather than capture a local variable.
timeline.author: ashleyfrieze

timeline.bodyText:
This may be a big change, but classUnderTest is a terrible name for the thing we're testing.
dataObject would be better. You should never name an object class unless it is an object of type Class - i.e. the metadata of a class.
timeline.author: ashleyfrieze
ashleyfrieze
ashleyfrieze

timeline.bodyText: redundant blank line - please also note the other instances of that in this class - there's no need for a blank space just after or just before the { or } of a function.
timeline.author: ashleyfrieze

timeline.bodyText: break the line at the . of .flatMap you can optionally also break the line at the . of findFirst as well.
timeline.author: ashleyfrieze
